cards.name: Iron Man
cards.bio: Genius inventor Tony Stark in his iconic suit, ready to make the ultimate sacrifice for the universe.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Iron Man from Avengers: Endgame in a heroic pose, high-tech suit gleaming

cards.name: Captain America
cards.bio: Steve Rogers, the super soldier with his unbreakable shield and unwavering courage.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Captain America from Avengers: Endgame holding his shield, determination in his eyes

cards.name: Thor
cards.bio: The God of Thunder, wielding Stormbreaker and Mjolnir, ready to bring the thunder.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Thor from Avengers: Endgame with Stormbreaker and Mjolnir, lightning crackling around him

cards.name: Hulk
cards.bio: Bruce Banner in his Hulk form, combining brawn with brains as the smart Hulk.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Hulk from Avengers: Endgame, looking intelligent and strong

cards.name: Black Widow
cards.bio: Natasha Romanoff, the master spy and martial artist, prepared to fight for her family.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Black Widow from Avengers: Endgame in a combat stance, ready for stealth and action

cards.name: Hawkeye
cards.bio: Clint Barton, the sharpshooting archer, seeking redemption and justice.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Hawkeye from Avengers: Endgame with his bow drawn, focused and precise

cards.name: Captain Marvel
cards.bio: Carol Danvers, the powerful hero from another world, ready to defend the universe.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Captain Marvel from Avengers: Endgame, energy pulsing from her hands

cards.name: Ant-Man
cards.bio: Scott Lang, the size-shifting hero who can pack a punch or sneak up unnoticed.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Ant-Man from Avengers: Endgame in his suit, ready to change size at a moment's notice

cards.name: Scarlet Witch
cards.bio: Wanda Maximoff, with her reality-altering powers, seeking vengeance and justice.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Scarlet Witch from Avengers: Endgame, chaos magic swirling around her hands

cards.name: Doctor Strange
cards.bio: The Sorcerer Supreme, bending reality and time to protect the universe from threats.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Doctor Strange from Avengers: Endgame with the Cloak of Levitation, casting a spell

cards.name: Thanos
cards.bio: The Mad Titan, seeking to balance the universe by wiping out half of all life, with the Infinity Gauntlet at his disposal.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Thanos from Avengers: Endgame in full armor, Infinity Gauntlet on his hand, looking menacing
